plptool.dmf

Class DynamicModuleFramework

  • java.lang.Object
    • plptool.dmf.DynamicModuleFramework

  • public class DynamicModuleFramework
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the dynamic module loading framework for PLPTool. The class loader and the class load routine are generic, they can be used to load generic classes and attach them to the list to be used in plptool later for any reason. Object instantiations of dynamic classes are superclass specific. Instantiation routines are expected to return a null reference if they failed and call error #1040 (e.g. typecasting error).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean warned
      Boolean to give warning about loading 3rd party modules once

    • Method Detail

      • loadModuleClass

        public static boolean loadModuleClass(java.lang.String path,
                                      java.lang.String className)
        Module class loading routine for PLPTool dynamic module framework. This function is called by PLPToolApp class during program startup via the --load-class parameter.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the Java class file
        className - Java class name (package.subpackage...class)
        Returns:
        True if class is loaded and attached to the list, false otherwise

        Returns:
        Reference to the module class

        public static int isModuleClassRegistered(java.lang.String name)
        Check whether the specified module class is registered and return the index of the class in the list
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the class to look up
        Returns:
        The index of the class if found, -1 otherwise

        Returns:

        plp -
        prompt -

        public static PLPSimBusModule newBusModuleInstance(int index)
        Create a new instance of a module class and cast it to PLPSimBusModule.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the class
        Returns:
        Reference to the newly instantiated object casted to a simulation bus module. Returns null pointer if instantiation failed for any reason.

      • generateManifest

        public static java.lang.String generateManifest(java.lang.String path,
                                                java.lang.String title,
                                                java.lang.String author,
                                                java.lang.String license,
                                                java.lang.String description,
                                                java.lang.String version)
        Generate a plp.manifest file for a given Java package as specified by the path. This method will recursively go through the directories, resolve interface/superclass dependencies and generate the manifest file.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to Java package directory
        connectorClass - Class implementing PLPGenericModule that will be loaded by PLPTool when the module is loaded
        Returns:
        String of the plp.manifest file
